activities.name: AU_To_FC
activities.description: copy the file from the blob storage azurementoringauxx to Azure data lake azurementoringdatalakexx

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(TransactionDt) as NewWatermarkValue from Tickets

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from Tickets where TransactionDt > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMark').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and TransactionDt <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

body.message: This is a custom dynamic message from your pipeline with run ID @{pipeline().RunId}.

properties.description: linked service to the [online] azure blob storage container
